name: Satanya's Adventure: All you need is melonpan

name: Super Xevious: Gamp no Nazo
description: In Super Xevious: Gamp no Nazo the player controls a spaceship named the Solvalou in its mission to destroy a powerful supercomputer named GAMP, which took over Earth during an ice age. Gamp no Nazo features a heavy focus on puzzle-solving, with each of the game's 21 levels posing a puzzle that must be solved to progress.

name: In Next Life
description:
In next Life is a crafting, survival, and civilization building game, where collaboration with other players gives you very real advantages (it is possible to play alone, but it will be harder to survive). Your technology level starts at stone age level, and then it's up to you and your village members to invent and craft tools and technologies such as fire, baskets, spears, ..., in order to survive easier and to advance to new development stages. Time moves quickly and each game played equals one life, including birth, childhood, adulthood and old age.

The goal of each life is to contribute as much as possible to the survival and development of your village, children and future descendants. What you leave behind will be the foundation for others to keep building on. The flint spear you invented one life, could turn out to be the difference between survival and annihilation for your whole civilization. There are hundreds of objects you can craft, collect, cook, and eat. We intend to add at least 1,000 more during the Early Access period.

name: Maestro
description: Maestro is a MusicVR video game by British musician Mike Oldfield. It is the second publicly released MusicVR game after 2002's Tres Lunas.

name: Ashes: Afterglow
description: Reprise your rule as a "scav" in this post-apocalyptic first-person shooter. A voice on the radio is calling for you. Find this mysterious "Athena" and you might finally get some answers. Be mindful of your choices along your journey or face unintended consequences.

name: Puzzle Inlay
description: Puzzle Inlay is a logical tiling puzzle game where the player has to fill in unique shapes with available blocks

name: 2D Platformer Game (Toy Factory)
description: 2D Platformer Game (Toy Factory) is a cute 2D platformer with cute characters about a mother's soul trying to return safely to her daughter.

name: Demolition Derby 3
description: Demolition Derby 3 is a racing game. Choose your car and hop in the driver's seat! Choose from 90+ cars! 3 different game modes: Race, Derby, and Freeplay. You can also do Tournaments to show off your skills! Race with AI or players from all over the world!

name: Ikemen Genjiden Ayakashi Koi Enishi
description:
It is 1192 in Kamakura period.

Murdered by his brother Minamoto no Yoritomo, Minamoto no Yoshitsune revived from the dead by borrowing the power of youkai. As an herbalist, you accidentally learns the truth of the dark secret and is involved in the plot of revenge.

At the same time, the small fox that you saved before suddenly transforms into an evil fox!

“The one with an innocent soul, I give permission to form a contract with me.”

Trapped in the turmoil brought by the Minamoto brothers, an unexpected love story thus unveils…

name: Gartic Show
description: Gartic Show is a draw and guess game made for streaming. Challenge the audience to guess what you are drawing.

name: Warlord
description:
It is the year 1201, the onset of Kamakura period. The player starts as a ruler of a small village on the coast of Japan, which supports itself by slave labor and spoils of war raids. Each year you must make decisions, whether to train troops, hire samurai and mercenaries, build merchant ships, adjust the workforce in the fields, import/export food to feed your population/raise your treasury, attack pirates or raid your neighbours. You may be challenged to battle not only by opposing warlords (you may choose to pay tribute to avoid combat), but also your own samurai if you display weak leadership. The game ends with either subjugation of the opponents, after 30 years of reign - or with your untimely death.

Three difficulty settings available. The ZX81 version of Warlord doesn't display the map nor animations.

name: Half-Life 2: Deeper Down
description: In 2013’s Half Life 2 mod Deep Down, Jim Partridge took several key aspects from Episode Two, Alyx and the car, and expanded on these in an attempt to re-create that amazing Half-Life 2 feeling that everyone is looking for. Now, with seven additional years worth of level and environment design experience, Jim has taken another swing at the concept. With thirteen almost entirely new maps, new environments, new gameplay concepts, new puzzles, custom models (care of Ed Vincent), and original music (from Anicator), Deeper Down asks you to hit the road one last time and take down the one enemy who’s always been watching.

name: Nifty League
description:
Nifty League is a blockchain-based, arcade-style collection of games.

Nifty League isn't just any gaming league, we're a group of hardcore competitive gaming degenerates set out to disrupt an entire industry.
Our community members own their characters (by way of non-fungible tokens/NFTs), get to earn $NFTL token by playing (play to earn, renting characters, etc), have a say in the direction of the entire project as its set to be fully community governed and decentralized, and a whole slew of other perks & benefits.

name: FNAF: Final Purgatory

Still, that won't keep him from creating the World's #1 Dinner for his second anniversary with Galo Thymos. Lio used to lead the Burnish in their fight against oppression, surely he can manage one simple meal! Meanwhile, Galo has planned an anniversary surprise of his own...

Welcome to Holo Café. The V-Tuber café with the most modern animatronics. Be prepared to meet Usada Pekora, Nakiri Ayame, Shirakami Fubuki, and other Hololive girls!

But don’t be too careless now, because you must be with them all night long.

A cloning experiment has gone awry and you find yourself in the Black Mesa you know, but it isn't the Black Mesa you know! Dr. Coomer and his clones have gone and made a muck of things and it's up to you to find enough PlayCoins to appease them!

name: Disco Dating
description: Disco Dating is a fan-made dating simulator inspired by Disco Elysium. Players step into the role of Harry Du Bois, navigating through dialogue and decisions on a date with one of three characters: Klaasje, the Smoker on the Balcony, or Kim Kitsuragi. The gameplay involves making choices that determine whether Harry's date goes smoothly, humorously awry, or somewhere in between.

name: Puzzle Juggle Trouble
description:
A stacking puzzle game where you get two increasingly terrible pieces at once.

In this game, just like in regular Tetris, pieces fall from the sky. Unlike regular Tetris however, you are given multiple pieces at once, and you can swap between controlling one or another at any given time. You clear blocks by either making solid lines, or by filling square regions of at least 5 blocks by 5 blocks. The former increases the speed of the blocks' fall, the latter makes you move on to more and more complex pieces.

Try Arcade mode to see how far you go and push for higher scores, or race in Time Trial to set record times! You can also play Arcade mode in local Co-op between a keyboard player and a controller player, or have a custom game of Arcade mode where you can change various settings, from what pieces you get to how many at once are falling or even the size of the board.

name: Vastynex
description:
Thunder Force Inspired Shooter. Homages to retro shooting games.

At the beginning of the game, you'll only be capable of shooting in front and behind your ship, but by acquiring weapons from the item carriers that appear during each stage, you'll gain access to lasers, homing shots and more.

Defeating enemies in rapid succession increases the score multiplier gauge up to a maximum of x8, with larger and more durable enemies offering a speed-kill bonus equal to x4 of your current score multiplier (maximum x32).

The ending can be reached by clearing all six stages, and you can watch a replay of your run from the main menu.

In this game your choice is simple!
Do you grab three more items or do you keep what you have? Treasure Punks is a game of pushing your luck. The first player to grab 13 treasures wins the match. Mind your grabbing though - there are skulls hidden in the pile! Disturb three skulls and loose your points!

description: Card simulator with multiple kinds of decks

name: Taiheiki
description: Taiheiki is a turn-based strategy game based on the Japanese 14th century historical epic of the same name. Like the book, the game portrays the struggle between the Northern Court, ruled by the decadent Hōjō clan (later betrayed by their vassal Ashikaga Takauji), and the Southern Court of the emperor Go-Daigo. The gameplay has strong grand strategy elements and is similar to Koei's "historical simulation" series. The player can choose to control either the Northern or the Southern forces, choosing the actions for the leader and all his vassals. The player can choose to engage in diplomacy with rulers of other provinces, sign agreements, and manage and navigate armies. Combat takes place on a separate top-down grid, on which he player navigates the soldiers in turn-based fashion. Individual battles proceed automatically, their outcome based on the participant's attributes.

name: Sengoku Jidai: Genko Campaign - 2nd Mongol Invasion of Japan 1281
description: 1282, with the conquest of China almost complete, Kublai Khan turns his glance towards the land of the Rising Sun and demands it bend the knee and pay tribute to his empire. The Japanese refuse, and it leads to war. Historically, a great storm stopped the invading fleet, the “Divine Wind”. But what if there was no storm? Fight the war for Japanese independence in this what-if campaign!

name: Packing House
description: Start your own online store! Buy products from wholesalers and list them profitably on the Internet. Increase your shipping capacity and assortment. Ensure timely delivery to customers and that everyone receives the goods they ordered. Beware of negative reviews as they can spoil your reputation!

name: Zombie Carnage 2
description: Zombie Carnage 2 is a 32 player first person shooter where you will play both as a human and zombie. By killing zombies and infecting humans you will permanently level up, unlock weapons, attachments, zombie classes and more.

name: Creamy Mami: Futari no Rondo
description:
Based on the anime Creamy Mami, the Magic Angel. The original tells the story of a 10-year-old girl named Yuu Morisawa, who gains a magical ability to transform into a grown-up young woman, eventually becoming a pop star and acquainting the inhabitants of the Earth with the rest of the galaxy. Yuu appears in the game, but is not the protagonist; the player controls four young women in four different scenarios: two of them, Yuri and Aya, on the Earth, and the other two, Ora and Sita, in an alien world, mixture of sci-fi and medieval fantasy. The story goes beyond the original anime by introducing a magical, sacred land known as Finality, populated by fantasy being, and calling the guardians (the four girl protagonist) to bring peace to the galaxy.

Futatsu no Sekai plays automatically for the most part, except key scenes which allow interaction - two, sometimes more choices that have to be done by the player. In many cases these choices are merely cosmetic, or may lead to a different text description and scene.

name: Google Minesweeper
description: Google Minesweeper is a playable version of the game Minesweeper that is accessible in the Google search engine.

name: Panty&Demons
description:
According to Japanese folklore, if you won't destroy the thing that have seen service, it will come to life and turn into yokai. It's called Tsukumogami - "spirit of the old tool".
One of such long forgotten yokai breaks free, leaded by the appetite for revenge to the descendants of thouse who sealed him, starving for women Yin energy.
Will and ordinary schoolboy be able to save all his friends?

Panty & Demons is a match-3 style puzzle game with a visual novel style of presentation and a little sprinkle of RPG elements.

name: I'm on Observation Duty 4
description: Fourth instalment in the indie horror game series "I'm on Observation Duty". A spot the difference -type of puzzle horror game. Monitor live surveillance camera footage and spot anomalies ranging from furniture movement to intruders. Fix anomalies by filing a reports describing the type and location of the anomaly. You will need sharp eyes and good memory. The goal is to survive from 00:00 to 06:00.

name: Tipston Salvage
description: Junkyard logistics couch co-op game that focuses on teamwork and communication. Store, crush and ship processed scrap as fast as possible, while trying to synchronize with your teammates.

name: Kmf
description: Fishmaster's Tour Platinum Extreme: Fish 'Till You Drop

name: Valley of the Moon
description: A first person exploration game about going to the Moon. Made for Ludum Dare 36.

name: Newtonian Horror
description: Step into the boots of Isaac Newton, in a world before gravity was invented. Newtonian Horror is an occult platformer where you can't move or shoot and the only weapon at your disposal is gravity. Use your exceptional knowledge as Newton to manipulate gravity and defeat your enemies!

name: Made in Physics
description: A physics based game with many minigames!

name: Obsolete
description: Can old hardware find a new life?

name: Slimer
description: Puzzle Gravity Control Platformer

name: The Switch-Worker
description: Play as a Switchboard Telephone Worker

name: Gizmo of Giza
description: Sin descripción

name: Hello Hello
description: A fast-paced game of connections on an old-fashioned switchboard

name: How Now, Sea Cow?
description: A little girl and her aquatic mammal friend. Solve puzzles, care for your beastie, and enjoy the slow coastal vibe.

name: Ancient Orb
description: You are in a Ancient Temple. Collect orbs to fuel the ancient apparatuses.

name: Shadow of Babel
description: A downcast civilization, someone who wants answers, and a great tower where nothing is what it seems.

name: Salvo
description: Tactical Ordnance Command

name: The Kings of Limbo
description: The world is at war. You died. Hell is full and you're trapped in limbo. Gather your people and become a King.

name: Second Chance
description: A 2nd person horror game

name: Paralyzis
description: A short game about sleep paralysis...

name: Nemoral
description: A police officer is in search of missing children.

name: Nuclear Reaction
description: One-Button Local-Multiplayer

name: Xmasss Terror
description: Help Santa to collect lost presents.

name: Chronomancy: Watchmaker's Curse
description: Chronomancy: Watchmaker's Curse is a turn-based bullet hell game. Dodge tons of projectiles and plan your moves ahead to clear a path through every stage! Steal time from enemies to prevent your own lifetime from running out. Live on your last few seconds. Find your way through ever-changing floors in a level that's different every time!

name: Bee Holder
description: More you have, harder it is. Survive, Honey or Bees?

name: Sebil Engineering
description: Sebil Engineering is a game about "fixing" roads.

name: Jolly 3: Chapter 1
description:
Thirty-two years after the incident has happened, an indie entertainment company sets out on a mission to revive the unsolved mysteries of Freddy Fazbear's Pizza! This Halloween, they will open a horror attraction called "Fazbear's Fright" featuring ancient and original artifacts which made childhood memories who should never be spoken about again.

This time, they set out location to location to find more items to put in their attraction. Their first target would be in an abandoned factory where Jolly Entertainment used to be in! Conspiracy theorists nationwide are more than hyped! And hopes to find clues that will solve the mysteries once and for all.

name: Jolly 3: Chapter 2
description: Your job isn't finished just yet. You must spend another five nights in this horrid facility. But this time, an atrocious discovery has yet to be made...

name: Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity - Wave 1: Pulse of the Ancients
description: Wave 1 includes an expanded roster, newly added weapon types, and challenging enemies. Dominate the battlefield as the playable Battle-Tested Guardian or try out the added Flail weapon for Link and Master Cycle for Zelda. These combat styles will come in handy as you face the challenging Apocalyptic difficulty and added enemies like the bomb-throwing Moblin and Giant Chuchu. You can also stop by the Royal Ancient Tech Lab to test yourself with new challenges!

name: Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity - Wave 2: Guardian of Remembrance
description: In Wave 2, experience a newly playable character duo, additional stages, and new story sequences. Defend Hyrule as the quirky duo character, Purah & Robbie, and their array of ancient technology. See how places like the Coliseum and Kakariko Village looked 100 years in the past in brand-new story stages. And learn more about the Champions and the mysterious Guardian in emotional new story sequences as the fight for Hyrule’s future continues.

name: Crusader Kings III: Royal Court
description: The Royal Court expansion to Crusader Kings III adds new ways to interact with the characters in your kingdom or empire, as well as major changes to the cultural system of the game, adding greater dynamism and historical fluidity.

name: Spaceship Hunters
description: Spaceship Hunters is a chaotic couch co-op shoot-em-up for 4 players. Working as a crew, fight your way through the worst criminals the universe has to offer.

name: Mystik Adventure
description:
You enter a world, after selecting New Game and entering a 'World-Seed'.

This number determines how the world looks and plays like. Find powerful spells and mighty weapons and armors that help you bring peace to the worlds!

The goal for the hero is to retrieve 3 crystals out of the dungeons and use them to enter the Void where the Dark Master waits. Can you defeat him? Or can you defeat him more than once?

name: Bouquet
description: Collect coins. Purchase flowers. Arrange bouquet. Surprise your darling.

name: Violet
description: A 2D platformer where colors can be turned on or off.

name: Goddess Husk
description: A beautifully presented adventure to awaken the Goddesses of old begins here. Guide your mute knight and blind magicker through harrowing encounters with the creatures of the Scourge and then wipe them out in the blink of an eye using the legendary power of the giantess Goddess.

name: Project Unirah
description: Project Unirah is a third person shooter created by a single developer using Unreal Engine 4. Fight your way through a factory setting, learn what happened and uncover the reason for your existence.

name: Araignees
description: Atmospheric First-Person Horror Adventure. Follow the feverish dream of an industrial worker plunged into a nightmare after a small spider bite...

name: Roskis: A Boozy Beginning
description: Explore the planet Roskis, meet hippie robots and corporate dinosaurs, find your runaway animals, battle against a pineapple pizza, and save the planet from... OH NO!

name: Legend of Egypt: Jewels of the Gods 2
description: A cat-like creature has entered the chambers of the Pharaoh and absorbed his soul. Who is behind this dark magic and will succeed in lifting the curse by building an imposing city?

name: The Divine Deception
description: The Divine Deception awaits you in Panthea. Will you be able to find the truth? Deduce, brainstorm, fight, and hack your ways through obstacles. But remember: Panthea's story is a game to be bet on. Nothing more.

name: Press D to Die
description: Did you ever want to die with the press of a button? Well now you can! In this quick to finish puzzle-platformer the corpses that will pave your path to victory will be your own.

name: Circus Pocus
description: Welcome to the circus of violence!

name: Gardenia
description:
Gardenia is a FPP gardening simulator with elements of platformer, crafting, adventure, exploration and more!

A laid-back combination of a gardening simulator and a fairy tale adventure. Help Wood Grandpa clean the island and restore its beauty so that its former inhabitants can return to their homes. Take photos of your garden compositions, relax and discover the secrets.

name: No Crooks on Christmas
description: No Crooks on Christmas is a tower defense game with a fun holiday theme. Defend your house against a relentless onslaught of crooks and save Christmas!

name: Loosepo
description: This is an ultra-lightweight Top-Down shooting game with roguelike elements. You need to constantly recycle your empty wine bottles to replenish ammunition. Use the initial props cards and the upgrade cards in the game to build a powerful butt baby, and then help it defeat the evil rotten demons

name: Carrot
description: 20 minutes long. Point and click your way through a short story which involves a magnifying glass, strawberries, flowers, unicorns and a carrot.

name: Get the Fluff Out
description: Race to the exit before the cave in! Every fluff for themselves!

name: Codex

You discover a strange manual.

Pen and graph paper is strongly recommended.

name: Nb107a
description:
Micheal's life isn't easy.

His father is a famous spy who was poisoned on his last mission by NB107A, an unknown chemical with no known cure. In a desperate attempt to alleviate his father's pain, Micheal joins Atlin Missionary University's Chemical Analysis program to find the cure himself.

Now his graduate adviser wants to have a serious talk and he knows that he's about to be sacked.

His last chance rests with a mysterious man who looks almost exactly like Micheal himself and who seems to know a little too much about NB107A...

Will Micheal find the cure for his father's illness? Why does this mysterious man look exactly like Micheal? Will Micheal's life ever get easier?!

description: Meet your boyfriend's nosy folks and try to keep your story straight.

You meet a man in the subway offering vast riches and exorbitant amounts of money. All you have to do is play a few simple games. Sounds like child's play... right?

name: The Cure
description: The Cure is a twin stick action explorer. Players control Clyde Everton, a scientist/engineer down on his luck. Weasel City has succumb to an airborne infection that has transformed all of its inhabitants into zombies! Clyde, recently infected, must fight his way through a variety of unique areas to gather the necessary components he needs to formulate a cure.

name: Under the Farm
description: Frantic Farmyard Roguelike Action Shooting Game. Defeat the demons for peace of farm!

name: Soul Grinder
description: In the skies of the seventh circle of hell, masses of flesh grind each other in eternal torment

name: Citizen Witch
description: Explore the city, meet monsters, help folks!

name: Operation: Ops
description:
Operation:OPS is a lo-fi stealth-action FPS set in an alternate 199X.

Play as an operative seemingly working for the world's most notorious terrorist, who is known only as "The Operator".

Your health is low, and you are outnumbered and vulnerable. Once you are detected, enemy reinforcements will arrive in waves until your mission is complete.

A variety of equipment can be selected before you deploy, such as explosives, motion trackers, nerve-gas grenades, sentry guns and amphetamines.

Fight in up to nine different operations, with seven possible endings, depending on who you save, and whose orders you choose to follow.

name: Mooon
description: Sin descripción

description: A vampire drives a taxi in the streets of New Wenders

description: Dual twin stick shooter pixel art ... :)

description: Dracula awakens to find his castle overrun by gawdy tourists. It's time to feast!

name: Vampire Vengeance
description: Arcade Platformer for ZX Spectrum.

name: Dracula's Pizza Delivery
description: A spooky Fast-Paced Game in 2.5D

name: Vampire Nights
description: Stalk the streets at night to suck the blood of unsuspecting villagers

name: Adventures of Chris
description: Embark on a global adventure in this ‘90s-inspired platformer about a chubby underdog kid with wacky superpowers.

name: Secret Satiation
description: Sin descripción

name: The Red Devil
description: You're a journalist on your way to interview Raven Eros, a mysterious nobleman who people claim is a vampire.

name: Vampire Heist
description: Fly as a bat, be unseen in the dark or phase through barriers as a cloud of bloody mist to recover what's yours!

name: Find me...
description: What secrets are your family hiding from you?....

name: The Candles Breathe
description: The Candles Breathe is a small game about a vampire looking for a victim, in a world where Spirits are very real and the people hold ceremonies twice a year to appease them and protect themselves.

name: Night Class: A Vampire Story
description: A short visual novel about what happens when a young woman joins a local study group and meets two mysterious brothers.

name: Bleeding Neon
description: A short interactive fiction about trashy vampires and the people who love them

name: Man Helsing
description: Derelicht Demon Slayer of Manly Cuteness

name: The Caretaker
description: The Caretaker is a Top Down, Dungeon-Crawler style survival game. Search your way through streets, buildings and sewers for anything you can use to keep you moving and keep you alive!

name: Shih Ho
description: Boy meets girl; or rather, boy gets bitten by vampire girl.

name: Clair & Lune
description: Sin descripción

name: Phucker in the Woods: Volume 0
description: A group of youngsters go to the woods to self-investigate a disappearance...

name: Blood Tender
description: Story Telling, Vampire Game

name: Rat Bastard
description: better a rat than an aristocrat

name: Your Friendly Neighborhood Vampire Detective
description: Can you solve the murder you committed?

name: Overexposure
description: Grow plants. Avoid the sun.

name: Star Court
description: It's the trial of the century!

name: The Power of Blood
description: Play as Count Mizael and raid villages!

description: Kill the vampires. Save the humans.

name: Bloodseeker
description: Take on the role of the vampire count and reclaim his castle in this little metroidvania.

name: Vampires: The New Birth
description: A story-driven Gothic visual novel

name: SinsFromGod 2
description: SinsFromGod makes a return for a second part and it's now better than ever, SinsFromGod 2 introduces all new mechanics that were not in the original game like interacting with objects such as picking up items like notes, weapons, health items, and more. We have also added horrifying jumpscares to make sure you have nightmares for nights on end.

name: Wrought Flesh
description: Rip out organs and equip them in your own body. Fight biopunk monsters and drugged-up space bandits. You are a Gajeshian Cultist: A near-mythological being built from the bodies of long-dead saints.

name: Pothead
description: To grow is to persevere through change.

name: Monster Rancher 1 DX
description:
Monster Rancher 1 DX is an updated version of Monster Rancher, featuring additional save slots, Freeze slots, Monster Hall of Fame slots, memos, rankings, and a high-speed mode.

It was released together with Monster Rancher 2 DX in the Monster Rancher 1 & 2 DX bundle.
